question:
Consider the following statements about Mixed Farming:
  1. It includes crop production as well as raising of livestock
  2. It is practised mainly in the hilly areas of Himalayas
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
Mixed farming includes crop production as well as raising of livestock on the same field. It is mainly practised in the hilly areas of Himalayas and north-east India.
